channel.title: CVE Feed for PiiGAB -- M-Bus SoftwarePack
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PiiGAB -- M-Bus SoftwarePack

item.title: CVE-2023-31277|2024-08-02T14:53:30.882Z -- piigab -- m-bus%20softwarepack
item.description: PiiGAB M-Bus transmits credentials in plaintext format.

item.title: CVE-2023-34995|2024-08-02T16:17:04.271Z -- piigab -- m-bus%20softwarepack
item.description: There are no requirements for setting a complex password for PiiGAB M-Bus, which could contribute to a successful brute force attack if the password is inline with recommended password guidelines.

item.title: CVE-2023-32652|2024-08-02T15:25:36.353Z -- piigab -- m-bus%20softwarepack
item.description: PiiGAB M-Bus does not validate identification strings before processing, which could make it vulnerable to cross-site scripting attacks.

item.title: CVE-2023-35765|2024-08-02T16:30:44.687Z -- piigab -- m-bus%20softwarepack
item.description: PiiGAB M-Bus stores credentials in a plaintext file, which could allow a low-level user to gain admin credentials.

item.title: CVE-2023-35987|2024-08-02T16:37:40.526Z -- piigab -- m-bus%20softwarepack
item.description: PiiGAB M-Bus contains hard-coded credentials which it uses for authentication.

item.title: CVE-2023-34433|2024-08-02T16:10:07.071Z -- piigab -- m-bus%20softwarepack
item.description: PiiGAB M-Bus stores passwords using a weak hash algorithm.

item.title: CVE-2023-33868|2024-08-02T15:54:12.837Z -- piigab -- m-bus%20softwarepack
item.description: The number of login attempts is not limited. This could allow an attacker to perform a brute force on HTTP basic authentication.

item.title: CVE-2023-35120|2024-08-02T16:23:59.178Z -- piigab -- m-bus%20softwarepack
item.description: PiiGAB M-Bus is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery. An attacker who wants to execute a certain command could send a phishing mail to the owner of the device and hope that the owner clicks on the link. If the owner of the device has a cookie stored that allows the owner to be logged in, then the device could execute the GET or POST link request.

item.title: CVE-2023-36859|2024-08-02T17:01:09.731Z -- piigab -- m-bus%20softwarepack
item.description:
PiiGAB M-Bus
SoftwarePack 900S
does not correctly sanitize user input, which could allow an attacker to inject arbitrary commands.
